<script type=text/javascript src=/js/jquery.touchSwipe.min.js  ></script  ><script type=text/javascript src=/js/jquery.advancedSlider.min.js  ></script  ><script
 type=text/javascript  >  jQuery(document).ready(function ($) { $('#responsive-slider').advancedSlider({ width: 800, height: 550, responsive: true, skin: 'glossy-square-gray', shadow: false, effectType: 'swipe', slideshow: true, pauseSlideshowOnHover: true, swipeThreshold: 30, slideButtons: false, thumbnailType: 'scroller', thumbnailWidth: 140, thumbnailHeight: 80, thumbnailButtons: true, thumbnailSwipe: true, thumbnailScrollerResponsive: true, minimumVisibleThumbnails: 2, maximumVisibleThumbnails: 6, keyboardNavigation: true }); });  </script  ><script type=text/javascript src=/js/jquery-1.10.2.min.js  ></script  ><script src=/js/jquery.pwstabs.js  ></script  ><script  >  jQuery(document).ready(function ($) { $('.tabset1').pwstabs({ effect: 'scale', defaultTab: 1, containerWidth: '989px' }); $('.pws_demo_colors a').click(function (e) { e.preventDefault(); $('.pws_tabs_container').removeClass('pws_theme_cyan pws_theme_grey pws_theme_violet pws_theme_green pws_theme_yellow pws_theme_gold pws_theme_orange pws_theme_red pws_theme_purple pws_theme_dark_cyan pws_theme_dark_grey pws_theme_dark_violet pws_theme_dark_green pws_theme_dark_yellow pws_theme_dark_gold pws_theme_dark_orange pws_theme_dark_red pws_theme_dark_purple').addClass('pws_theme_' + $(this).attr('data-demo-color')); }); });  </script  ><script src=/js/autoNumeric.js  ></script  ><script  >     $(".cost1111").autoNumeric('init');     </script  ><script src=js/jquery-3-3-1.js  ></script  ><script src=js/new-menu.js  ></script  ><script type=text/javascript src=js/jquery.navgoco.js  ></script  ><script type=text/javascript src=js/off-canvas.js  ></script  ><script  >  $(document).ready(function () { $(window).scroll(function () { if ($(this).scrollTop() > 50) { $('.header-bot').addClass("header-bot-fixed"); } else { $('.header-bot').removeClass("header-bot-fixed"); } }); });  </script  ><script  >  $(document).ready(function () { $("#toTop").hide(); $(function () { $(window).scroll(function () { if ($(this).scrollTop() > 100) { $('#toTop').fadeIn(); } else { $('#toTop').fadeOut(); } }); $('#toTop').click(function () { $('body,html').animate({ scrollTop: 0 }, 800); return false; }); }); });  </script  ></body  ></html  >
